    • Constructor Detail

      • ScanSettings.Builder

        public ScanSettings.Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • setScanMode

        public ScanSettings.Builder setScanMode(int scanMode)
        Set scan mode for Bluetooth LE scan.
        Parameters:
        scanMode - The scan mode can be one of ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER, ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_BALANCED or ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the scanMode is invalid.

      • setCallbackType

        public ScanSettings.Builder setCallbackType(int callbackType)
        Set callback type for Bluetooth LE scan.
        Parameters:
        callbackType - The callback type flags for the scan.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the callbackType is invalid.

      • setScanResultType

        public ScanSettings.Builder setScanResultType(int scanResultType)
        Set scan result type for Bluetooth LE scan.
        Parameters:
        scanResultType - Type for scan result, could be either ScanSettings.SCAN_RESULT_TYPE_FULL or ScanSettings.SCAN_RESULT_TYPE_ABBREVIATED.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the scanResultType is invalid.

      • setReportDelayMillis

        public ScanSettings.Builder setReportDelayMillis(long reportDelayMillis)
        Set report delay timestamp for Bluetooth LE scan.
        Parameters:
        reportDelayMillis - Set to 0 to be notified of results immediately. Values > 0 causes the scan results to be queued up and delivered after the requested delay or when the internal buffers fill up.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If reportDelayMillis < 0.

      • build

        public ScanSettings build()
        Build ScanSettings.
